title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama—chat, generate, embed, pull, list models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; same API surface as the Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration—use Ollama models as drop-in LLMs, chat, embeddings or tools.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model manager, RAG, multi-user) deployable via Docker.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with fluent API, streaming, and Android support.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem wrapping the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI with syntax highlighting, history, and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot-style inline suggestions.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Minimal Tauri desktop app wrapping Ollama for macOS/Windows/Linux with native notifications.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration letting you use Ollama models as generators or embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that caches and serves Ollama models inside CI pipelines for reproducible LLM tests.

title: ollama-n8n-node
summary: Official n8n node enabling no-code workflows with local Ollama models (chat, generate, embed).

title: ollama-rag
summary: Lightning-fast RAG example using llama.cpp embeddings, Ollama and SQLite-VSS for 100 % local search.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community C#/.NET SDK with async enumerable streaming and dependency-injection helpers.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that brings local Ollama models into any server with slash commands.

title: ollama-sdks
summary: Meta-repository tracking community SDKs for Go, PHP, Dart, Swift and more.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin for local AI autocomplete, summarization and note Q&A powered by Ollama.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Curated collection of docker-compose stacks combining Ollama with Open-WebUI, Nextcloud, and more.
